channel.title: Abouts on Akhil Raghav
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Akhil Raghav

item.title: About Me
item.description: Akhil Raghav I’m a developer from India with a passion for building native, easy-to-use software. My expertise lies in Swift, SwiftUI, and UIKit (programmatically). I also have experience with C++, HTML, CSS, and basic knowledge of JavaScript & TensorflowJS. My focus is on creating functional and user-friendly applications with a keen eye for design. I enjoy tackling complex problems and transforming them into elegant solutions. Whether it’s writing code or designing interfaces, I strive for simplicity, beauty, and intuitiveness in my work.

item.title: Resume
item.description: Education Bachelor of Computer Applications. Maharshi Dayanand University _ 2021 - 2024_ Senior Secondary Education (CBSE) March 2020 Secondary Education (CBSE) March 2018 Projects Developed a F1 car mod for the Open Source Minetest Game, enhancing the gameplay experience. Created a GitHub Action file enabling users to access macOS inside a runner,facilitating testing and development of Swift programs without the need for an actual Mac. Designed “ColabCraft,” a Google Colab file enabling Minecraft self-hosting without the requirement of a dedicated server.
